text: Puesto Cortaderas is an isolated basaltic pyroclastic cone in Neuquén Province, Argentina. It is in the Andean Volcanic Belt. ==See also== * List of volcanoes in Argentina ==References== * Category:Volcanoes of Argentina Category:Andean Volcanic Belt Category:Volcanoes of Neuquén Province Category:Mountains of Argentina Category:Pyroclastic cones
title: Puesto Cortaderas
